contents.title: R1 App Gallery
contents.description: Discover and download working Rabbit R1 apps

children.value: Browse our collection of working Rabbit R1 applications. Each app includes source code, documentation, and QR codes for easy installation on your R1 device.
Test your reflexes with precision timing. Features millisecond accuracy, best time tracking, and hardware button integration.
Hardware-accelerated reaction timer built with modern web technologies. Includes state machines and optimized performance.
Complete demonstration of R1 SDK capabilities including hardware controls, LLM integration, and persistent storage.
QR code generation and testing tools. Learn how to create proper QR codes for R1 app distribution.
All apps are hosted on Vercel and can be tested directly in your browser:
Reaction Timer - Test reflexes with precision timing
Note: Use Spacebar when testing in browser instead of R1 hardware buttons.

Each app page includes QR codes that you can scan directly with your R1 device to install and run the app. The QR codes contain properly formatted JSON manifests that the R1 device expects for installation.

contents.title: Reaction Timer
contents.description: Test your reflexes with precision timing on the Rabbit R1

children.value: A precision reaction time testing app for the Rabbit R1 device. Test your reflexes with millisecond accuracy and track your best times.
: Press the PTT button when you see the ready screen
: Screen turns red - get ready but don't press yet!
: When screen turns green, press PTT as fast as possible
: See your reaction time and compare with your best
: Persistent storage of your fastest reaction
: Optimized for R1 PTT button and scroll wheel
: Full-screen color changes for clear state indication
: Works on R1 and in browsers with keyboard fallbacks
Use Spacebar when testing in browser.
Scan this QR code with your R1 device to install:
Generated with our verified QR format for R1 compatibility.

props.code:
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/nytemode/r1-creations-sdk.git
cd r1-creations-sdk/apps/my-apps/reaction-timer

# Files:
# index.html - Main HTML structure
# js/app.js - Game logic and R1 integration
# css/styles.css - R1-optimized responsive styles

children.value: # js/app.js - Game logic and R1 integration
// Save best time using R1 storage
: Clear visual feedback with full-screen colors
: Large touch targets for R1's interface
The app is built with standard web technologies, making it easy to customize:

contents.title: Documentation
contents.description: Complete guides and API references for R1 app development

children.value: Complete technical documentation for building apps with the Rabbit R1 Creations SDK.
Complete guide to building working R1 apps, including QR code formats, architecture patterns, and deployment.
Comprehensive guide to R1 hardware APIs including buttons, sensors, storage, and LLM integration.
Learn how to generate proper QR codes for R1 app distribution and installation.
Deploy your R1 apps to Vercel and generate installation QR codes for distribution.
Reference for all R1 hardware event listeners and their parameters.
Complete reference for R1's persistent storage capabilities.
Documentation for communicating with R1's AI assistant.
Reusable UI patterns optimized for R1's small screen.
- Start building your first R1 app

contents.title: Getting Started
contents.description: Start building your first Rabbit R1 app in minutes

children.value: Getting Started with R1 App Development
Welcome to the Rabbit R1 Creations SDK! This guide will help you build your first app for the R1 device in just a few minutes.

props.code:
# Clone the SDK repository
git clone https://github.com/nytemode/r1-creations-sdk.git
cd r1-creations-sdk

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Start development server
npm run dev

children.value: Your documentation site will be available at

props.code:
# Copy a template
cp -r apps/templates/simple-app apps/my-apps/my-first-app
cd apps/my-apps/my-first-app

# Edit your app
# - index.html: Structure
# - css/styles.css: Styling
# - js/app.js: Logic

# Open in browser for testing
python -m http.server 8000
# Visit http://localhost:8000

# Use keyboard fallbacks:
# Spacebar = PTT button
# Arrow keys = Scroll wheel

# Generate QR code for R1 installation
node utils/generate-r1-qr.js "my-first-app" png

# This creates my-first-app-r1-qr.png

children.value: # Generate QR code for R1 installation

props.code:
# Build all apps
npm run build

# Deploy
npx vercel --prod

children.value: Use viewport units (vw/vh) for responsive design
Optimize for small screen real estate
Test with keyboard fallbacks during development
: Use browser dev tools with keyboard simulation
: Deploy to Vercel for device testing
: Make improvements based on device testing
to share your apps and get help
: Begin with basic interactions before adding complexity
: Use the live apps on Vercel to test on actual R1 hardware
: Study existing apps for proven R1 development patterns
: Always implement keyboard alternatives for development
: R1 has limited resources - keep apps lightweight

contents.title: Rabbit R1 Creations SDK
contents.description: Build amazing apps for the Rabbit R1 device

children.value: Build, deploy, and document your Rabbit R1 apps with our comprehensive SDK and documentation platform.
Complete API reference and guides for building R1 apps with hardware integration, storage, and LLM capabilities.
Discover and download working R1 apps. Each app includes source code, documentation, and QR codes for easy installation.
QR code generators, build scripts, and deployment tools to streamline your R1 app development workflow.
Join the community of R1 developers, share your apps, and contribute to the ecosystem.
Try out these R1 apps directly in your browser (with keyboard fallbacks for testing):
Reaction Timer - Test reflexes with precision timing
Note: Use Spacebar when testing in browser instead of R1 hardware buttons.
